programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Building of Britain
programme.desc:
Mighty Cathedrals: Fred uncovers the construction techniques of stonemasons and carpenters through the ages, focusing on Norman cathedrals. The former steeplejack admires Peterborough Cathedral and Rochester Castle, where he demonstrates how tactics used to invade the fortress centuries ago resemble today's demolition methods
S01E01

programme.title: A House Through Time
programme.desc:
David Olusoga traces the house's fortunes in the 18th and 19th centuries. He begins by investigating the death of owner Joseph Holbrook, and discovering why his daughter was written out of the will. A later resident of the home rises to become mayor in the 1830s, but had to find a way to prevent riots that had ravaged the city years earlier from occurring again. David also delves into the life of a servant who worked in the house in the 1870s, only to leave domestic servitude for an abusive marriage, and discovers how a successful teacher who later owned the house ended up committed to an asylum
S03E02

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Milton Keynes 4/5: Customer services manager and vegetarian Helen hosts the fourth night of the competition in Milton Keynes, Buckinghamshire, and hopes that an East meets West-themed night will win her the £1,000 prize. Hypnotherapist Howard is intrigued by some items he finds in her bedroom, while salesman Simon enjoys her entertainment

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc:
Kicking off the competition in Edinburgh are young lovebirds Andy and Pim, who are hoping to impress their guests with a Scottish and Thai-themed menu - with a bit of American thrown in for good measure. On the second night, the group learns more about Jimmy and Jas's fairy-tale first encounter, as well as Jimmy's fledgling modelling career, which surprises everyone. Night three sees a bromance between Andy and Stuart blossom, and everyone needs an open mind when they sample plumber Stuart and hairdresser Jack's experimental menu
S03E92

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2015: Mojacar, Spain: London couple Rena Sodhi and Donna Carty want a second home that they can escape to in the area of Mojacar in southern Spain. Laura Hamilton unearths a townhouse with stunning views for £25,000 less than their budget

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2017: St Lucia: Geri Melville is originally from St Lucia, but moved to the UK when she was just nine. Now, she's ready to return to her roots with her husband Ian, by buying a holiday home together on the island she left almost 50 years ago. With a budget of £360,000 Laura Hamilton shows them five properties boasting views of the Caribbean Sea

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc:
Sharon and Shaun Garner help Taz and Nicky find a large villa in Almería that can house them and their visiting friends and family, as well as Taz's prized collection of Cortinas
S05E22

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc:
The owners of a hamlet in the Limousin install a £10,000 septic tank, and a couple move ahead with plans for a sustainable lifestyle by buying hens. Plus, the progress of two estate agents who have spent 30 years rejuvenating a village in Portugal
S01E13

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc:
Henry Cole comes across a tractor and Simon O'Brien finds a small-wheeled design classic as the pair search for money-making items in Norfolk
S06E08

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Gloucestershire 1/5: Former property developer Ian hosts the first dinner party in Gloucestershire, hoping his super-healthy menu will win him the £1,000 prize - although it is possible his guests may be more impressed with his 12-bedroom mansion in the country. Some naked antics, a pinata and stories of millions pounds won and lost make it a night to remember

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Gloucestershire 2/5: Then-Miss Cheltenham Sophie hosts the second dinner party in Gloucestershire, hoping her evening of elegant food and pageantry will win her the £1,000 prize. The 24-year-old reveals what she does for a living to her guests, and one attendee makes a surprising confession of her own

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Gloucestershire 3/5: Rugby-loving Carmel hosts the third dinner party in Gloucestershire, and she hopes to impress with a 'Six Nations' starter, a pancetta, king prawn and chorizo main, and a Key lime pie for dessert. An attempt to charm her guests backfires when she likens Ian to a psychotic killer, and the atmosphere takes a further knock after Chris gets on the wrong side of Sophie

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Gloucestershire 4/5: School teacher Polly, 40, hosts the fourth night of the competition in Gloucestershire, and hopes to impress her guests with a fine-dining experience. She begins with a seafood starter before serving up a meaty main course, and isn't unnerved by the fact she hasn't had any practise cooking either dish. However, her guests show off round the table and threaten to take the attention away from the night, but Ian is highly impressed with Polly's choice of entertainment

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Gloucestershire 5/5: It is the turn of exuberant hair salon owner Chris to host the final dinner party in Gloucestershire with home-made treats on the menu, including a tiger prawn starter, venison for the main and a dessert of chocolate and walnut ice-cream. Chat around the table reveals some differing opinions after the guests make a discovery in the host's living room, and the group reflect on their time together before the winner of the cash prize is announced

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2023: Costa Da Caparica: Laura Hamilton helps fitness fans Caron and Ivo hunt for a holiday home in Costa Da Caparica, Portugal, on a budget of £300,000. The pair need enough space for Ivo's five motorcycles and Caron's collection of clothes

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc:
Lake District, 2010: Kevin McCloud follows the progress of Robert and Milla Gaukroger, as they try to add three extensions to a 1980s property overlooking Windermere in the Lake District. Robert has designed his own heating system to achieve maximum sustainability, but the project begins with only £100,000 of the £400,000 budget in place, and he and his family have to move into the existing building while work goes on around them
S10E08

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc:
In Surrey, Kirstie and Phil are searching for homes to bring their house-hunters closer to family. Kirstie meets Lauren, who has decided to move out of her London flat to her own place in Guildford after a serious health scare. She is looking for space to work from home but the high prices in the area leave Kirstie struggling to find a property within budget that ticks all the boxes. Phil meets Eleanor, Laurence and their four-month old twin boys who are moving from Birmingham to be closer to their parents in Surbiton, but with house prices where they are searching being nearly double where they have left, Phil has his work cut out for him
S39E03

programme.title: Grand Designs: The Streets
programme.desc:
Two families from Yorkshire venture into the world of self-build as they attempt to build a new street. Nicola is designing and project-managing a traditional redbrick family home with a modern twist but things start to go wrong when her triangular window, the centrepiece of her vision, does not fit upon arrival. Down the road, Matt and Maryellen are building a flamboyant, Brazilian-inspired home. Steelworker Matt is keen to put his work to good use but Maryellen fears it will make the building feel industrial
S03E01

programme.title: xXx: The Return of Xander Cage (2017)
programme.desc: The extreme sports-loving super spy is brought out of exile when a lethal gang of mercenaries steal a powerful new weapon that threatens the safety of the entire world. He must assemble his own team of adrenaline junkie agents to recover the lethal device. Action thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Donnie Yen, Toni Collette and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc:
100 Per Cent Bosco: Contenders Frankie Boyle, Ivo Graham, Jenny Eclair, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Mae Martin continue to address the challenges set for them by Greg Davies. At this stage of the competition, it's no surprise that people find retrieving pineapples from a millpond stressful. The comics inventively repurpose umbrellas and - in a fitting climax - Frankie goes to town on a gigantic cat scratching post. As usual, Alex Horne helps maintain order
S15E08

programme.title: Open House: The Great Sex Experiment
programme.desc:
A bold new social experiment exploring whether relationships can thrive without monogamy. Cameras follow a group of currently monogamous couples as they explore for the first time whether they would be happier in an open relationship
S02E01

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc:
Anna Richardson meets 31-year-old bar supervisor and mum of two Sam from Melton Mowbray who is seeking her own superhero complete with thunder thighs and the smouldering looks of Aquaman. Plus, 34-year-old Tony who has recently left the Royal Marines enlists Anna's help. He already has a son and a dog, but now is looking for Mrs Right to complete 'Team Tony'
S11E05

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc:
A nurse shares her story of finding a career she loves, and doctors suspect a 93-year-old man with a low heart rate, dizziness and confusion may need a new pacemaker fitting. A construction worker whose finger has been crushed discusses the importance of male role models in his life, and a haemophiliac reflects on living with his condition
S24E04

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders
programme.desc:
Jamie cooks two one-pan recipes that are ideal for busy lives: his take on shakshuka with asparagus, broccoli and harissa, plus an outrageously good pulled pork that can be batched up, frozen and used in loads of meals whenever you need it
S01E06

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Milton Keynes 5/5: It is the final evening in Milton Keynes and the dinner party is thrown by salesman Simon, who believes that his night of fine dining will impress the critical guests. However, things begin to go awry when Howard embarks on a mission to throw his plans off course, and Helen discovers a collection of awards that evidence the host's competitive nature. Meanwhile, Louise finally comes clean about her dislike of David, before the votes are cast and the winner is announced

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc:
Glasgow pair Jean and Ron hope their 'taste of Scotland' menu will impress their guests. Day two sees Colin and Craig try to claw back the limelight and jolly up the mood
S03E87

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2015: Lanzarote: Jasmine Harman helps couple Jane and David Turnbull, who have a budget of £80,000, to search for a house in Lanzarote. The property must have a lot of potential, and the pressure is on as it will eventually become their retirement home

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2017: Fort Myers, Florida: Ben Hillman shows retired North Lanarkshire couple Bill and Maureen Hughes five properties in and around the town of Fort Myers, Florida, within their budget of £320,000. The pair hope to create a whole new chapter of family memories - and escape the ravages of the Scottish winter

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc:
Linda and Charlotte Rodriguez help Julie and David, who want to swap wet winters in their Welsh caravan for a holiday haven in the Costa Blanca sun, for a budget of 115,000 euros
S05E23

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc:
The owners of a village in France officially open after two years of renovations. Cameras catch up with the man who rescued an abandoned hamlet in Spain who could now lose half of what he bought. Meanwhile, in Portugal, a couple start an animal sanctuary in their village
S01E14

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc:
Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien find unique items lost in people's homes to fix up for a profit. Henry is barn searching on his doorstep in Oxfordshire, while Simon makes the long journey down from Liverpool. It's a 'tank off!' as Simon hatches a wacky plan to turn some old tanks into a pizza oven, while Henry turns a redundant water tank into a mobile shelving unit
S06E09

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: London: The competition heads to south-east London, where first to host is 25-year-old online journalist Leah, who hopes her Mediterranean feast of mixed-mezze and lamb kleftiko will win her the £1,000 cash prize. Other contestants include art events organiser Gina, Italian personal trainer Vincenzo and pub manager Josh

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: London: Personal trainer Vincenzo hosts the second night in south-east London, where he hopes to impress his guests with traditional recipes handed down through his Italian family and a spot of salsa dancing. The guests also engage in some dicey debating - ensuring there is never a dull moment to the party

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: London: Bar manager Josh presents the third dinner party in south-east London, and hopes to wow his guests with a menu inspired by beer. However, they may not be too impressed to find their host's favourite tipple featuring in every course. Josh also cuts corners in the kitchen and tries to hide the fact he has had part of his main meal delivered

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: London: Texan psychologist David hosts the fourth night of the competition in south-east London, and takes inspiration from his passion for Mexican food. However, his guests are surprised by his love of spice, and his elaborate entertainment and controversial conversations make it a party to remember

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: London: On the final day of the competition in south-east London it is part-time event organiser Gina's turn to throw a dinner party. She rolls out an evening of fine dining inspired by her love of cookery courses, but her culinary prowess fails to make an impact on Vincenzo, as he reveals he already ate dinner at home due to his belief that women can't cook. Meanwhile, Leah reveals a surprising beauty secret from her youth during the main course, before a self-penned poem from the host brings tears to David's eyes, and the winner is revealed

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2023: Málaga Province, Spain: Danni Menzies helps Lincolnshire farmers David and Debbie, who are looking for a holiday home, in and around the town of Coin in Spain's Málaga Province. The pair want a place that's big enough to house their five children and Woody, their horse, within a budget of £230,000

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc:
In Surrey, Kirstie and Phil are searching for homes to bring their househunters closer to family. Kirstie meets Lauren, who has decided to move out of her London flat to her own place in Guildford after a serious health scare. She is looking for space to work from home but the high prices in the area leave Kirstie struggling to find a property within budget that ticks all the boxes. Phil meets Eleanor, Laurence and their four-month old twin boys who are moving from Birmingham to be closer to their parents in Surbiton, but with house prices where they are searching being nearly double where they have left, Phil has his work cut out for him
S39E03

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A look back at some of the most memorable staff and patient stories filmed since 2011 at King's College Hospital and St George's in south London - places where life, love and loss unfold every day. At St George's, 22-month-old Daisy arrives by air ambulance after being kicked in the head by a horse. She has a fractured skull, a bruise on her brain and concussion. As surgeons plan their next move, Maggie, an 83-year-old with a lust for life, has suspected sepsis, and five-year-old Roman has a pencil lead stuck in his ear. His mum Annie says Roman is charming and affectionate but can also be a handful

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc:
A nurse shares her story of finding a career she loves, and doctors suspect a 93-year-old man with a low heart rate, dizziness and confusion may need a new pacemaker fitting. A construction worker whose finger has been crushed discusses the importance of male role models in his life, and a haemophiliac reflects on living with his condition
S24E04

programme.title: Open House: The Great Sex Experiment
programme.desc:
A bold new social experiment exploring whether relationships can thrive without monogamy. Cameras follow a group of currently monogamous couples as they explore for the first time whether they would be happier in an open relationship
S02E01

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc:
The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, with cameras capturing their instant reactions and the lively discussions that are prompted by the week's biggest and best shows
S21E13

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc:
The armchair critics share their opinions on shows from late 2021, including I'm a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!, True Story, Miriam and Alan: Lost in Scotland, Tiger King 2, Close to Me and Inside Beverly Hills: The Land of the Rich and Famous. Plus, news coverage of the illegal Channel crossings and the emergence of the Omicron variant of the coronavirus. Narrated by Craig Cash
S18E12

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc:
Guests include a woman whose exes tend to marry someone else soon after the break-up, who is paired with a wedding photographer in search of a picture-perfect love of his own. A divorced grandfather trying to conceal his age connects with a business analyst who has been called 'unapproachable', while a former youth Olympic trampolinist from Essex fears his ginger hair is holding him back
S20E05

programme.title: The Big Fat Quiz of Everything
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts a big fat night of pointless sports trivia, with panellists Roisin Conaty, Judi Love, Joel Dommett, Dane Baptiste, Kerry Godliman and Tom Allen pondering Why Paula Radcliffe apologised to the nation, which sports have been played on the moon, and what trademarks belong to Muhammad Ali. Charles Dance heads up the celebrity question setters, alongside the kids of Mitchell Brook Primary School

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders
programme.desc:
Jamie cooks up three delicious one-pan recipes: his super-speedy smoked salmon pasta, a loaded beef burger with sweet red peppers, pickles and mustard, and gorgeously soft and sticky toffee apple buns
S01E07

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Durham 1/5: Hairdresser Julie hosts the first of a week of dinner parties in Co Durham, hoping to win over her guests with a no-nonsense menu she can prepare in advance. Joining her are tough-talking prison transport officer Tina, dreadlocked farm-dweller Stephen, superior IT manager David and glamorous beauty-school teacher Ashleigh. Alliances are quickly forged when David and Tina discover they both love a good gossip, before they turn their attention to Stephen when David compares him to a tramp. Julie overcooks her beef, but will her hosting make up for it and bag her the £1,000 prize?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Durham 2/5: Beauty teacher Ashleigh throws the second of the week's parties in Co Durham, she hopes a menu of sophisticated dishes - along with a helping of hearts and love - will help her win the cash prize. However, cracks were already beginning to show in the diners' genial facade yesterday, and the hostess realises she must play peacemaker if she is to keep everyone from falling out

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Durham 3/5: Call centre complaints officer and part-time farmer Stephen hosts the third night of a week of dinner parties in Co Durham. He hopes to win the £1,000 prize money by impressing his guests with an evening on his farm, featuring a drinks reception and rustic cuisine. However, self-confessed snob Tina makes it perfectly clear what she thinks of his efforts

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Durham 4/5: Prison transport officer Tina is the fourth host in Co Durham. She hopes to impress her guests with a sophisticated French menu including salmon crepes, chicken and posh peas and pear dessert. But having been highly critical of everyone else's food so far, will they now take the chance to get their own back or can she win them round?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Durham 5/5: The final evening of gatherings in Co Durham sees IT manager David stage a French-themed soiree in the hope of securing the £1,000 prize. However, he soon finds his main challenge is to keep all his guests on friendly terms

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc:
In Almería, husband-and-wife duo Steve and Sharon Garner help Melanie and Arthur search for their perfect Spanish home for their budget of 295,000 euros
S05E21

Across the border on Portugal's Algarve, Tony and his wife Sarah have sold their Nottinghamshire home and are looking to start a new life in the sun along with their beloved pair of pooches
S05E23

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc:
In Almería, husband and wife Steve and Sharon Garner help food fans Adam and Simon find their perfect holiday home, which they eventually hope to retire to, for a budget of 180,000 euros. Over the border on the Algarve, husband and wife Andrew and Katie, who moved to Portugal a year ago and have spent the past 12 months living with Katie's father, are eager to find a place to call their own
S05E24

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2020: Gran Canaria: Colin and Richard from Glasgow love Playa del Ingles in Gran Canaria and have been holidaying there for over 20 years. With retirement approaching, they feel now's the perfect time to buy their dream holiday home there to escape the Scottish winters and spend up to six months of the year in the sunshine. Jean Johansson lines up five potential properties for their budget of £200,000, but will any of them seem the perfect place?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2018: Cyprus: Charlie and Mandy first met 20 years ago on the island of Cyprus and have now decided to make it a base for regular family holidays with their two young daughters. Jonnie Irwin scours the market to show them a mix of properties for their maximum budget of £135,000

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Lee Juggurnauth heads to Los Gigantes, Tenerife to meet ambulance dispatcher Helen and builder Andrew from Yorkshire who are looking for a holiday home. Armed with a budget of £130,000 , Lee shows the couple five properties with hopes that one of them will be their dream holiday home

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2018: Crete: The island of Crete holds a special place in the hearts of Roy and Caroline Loates as it's the place where they married. Now with a budget of £100,000, they want to make it their permanent home. Jasmine Harman selects five properties for them to choose between

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Danni Menzies heads to the Correze region in France to help Alan and Joe find their perfect holiday home. programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E

Julie overcooks her beef, but will her hosting make up for it and bag her the £1,000 prize?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Durham 4/5: Prison transport officer Tina is the fourth host in Co Durham. S06E13

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Nottingham 1/5: Marketing manager Stephanie Hale hosts the first party in Nottingham, where her guests are local councillor Alex Foster, beauty therapist Janice Overton, project engineer Brian Hodges and businessman Barry Dickman. She encounters problems when one of the diners takes a dislike to her prawns, while another has trouble identifying an artichoke

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Nottingham 2/5: Local councillor Alex Foster throws the second party in Nottingham, hoping to impress with his French menu and a spot of bell-ringing for entertainment. However, one guest likens the host's starter to cat food, while another criticises his home's tidiness

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Nottingham 3/5: Beauty therapist Janice Overton hosts a 1970s-themed dinner party in Nottingham. The guests seem to be in the mood when they arrive suitably dressed for the occasion, but they soon begin to feel uncomfortable as one of them reveals that he is not keen on a fellow diner

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Nottingham 4/5: Engineer Brian Hodges hosts the penultimate dinner party in Nottingham. Knowing his skills are limited, he decides to rope in his local butcher to help out in the kitchen, borrows cutlery from a pub and persuades a friend's daughters to waitress for him

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Nottingham 5/5: Party animal Barry Dickman hosts the final dinner party in Nottingham, hoping his Greek-themed night will be enough for him to win the competition. His guests are served the country's traditional cuisine and are encouraged to dance, before the winner of the £1,000 prize is announced

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2023: Aegina, Greece: Lee Juggurnauth jets off to the Greek island of Aegina to help Marjory find the perfect holiday home that all her family can enjoy. She has chosen this island as it's just a ferry ride from her son and baby grandson, who live in Athens. With a budget of £150,000, Lee lines up five impressive options for her to consider

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc:
Lizard Peninsula, 2010: Kevin McCloud follows interior designer Kathryn Tyler as she tries to create a Scandinavian-style eco house in her mother's back garden in Falmouth, Cornwall, close by the Lizard Peninsula. The plan is ambitious, featuring a white-painted brick ground floor, a lightweight timber-frame first floor and cleverly designed spaces, but the small size of the plot and Kathryn's inexperience could hamper the project
S10E06

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc:
Karen and Richard have a large budget but no luck when it comes to making a deal, so they enlist the help of Kirstie Allsopp in their search for a family home in the West Midlands. Having already sold up in London, the pair are desperate to settle down with their three children but Kirstie thinks it might be their very specific wish list that is the problem. Camilla and Liam are struggling to keep up with the fast-moving market and can rarely book viewings before properties are sold so they ask Phil Spencer to help them in their search for a property to start a family in. With Nurse Camilla often working nightshifts, the pair are struggling to fit in some house hunting, after some time with Phil there are two contenders but some quick decisions must be made to avoid losing out yet again
S39E04

programme.title: Grand Designs: The Streets
programme.desc:
Tim plans to move from his small flat in Bicester into an architecturally daring home at the UK's largest mass self-build site in Graven Hill. With the help of his dad Michael, the project is supposed to be a chance to spend quality time together outside of work but the stress begins to ramp up when the five-tonne car lift Tim ordered from China doesn't fit into the specially prepared hole in the basement. Plus, Kevin and Natasha revisit Jitinder, whose house was unfinished due to the moisture problems and his resin floor last time they met, now they experience the full splendour of his Hollywood Hills style home
S03E02

programme.title: American Assassin (2017)
programme.desc: After Mitch Rapp's girlfriend Katrina accepts his wedding proposal during an idyllic European beach holiday, they and many others are gunned down by terrorists. Mitch survives and becomes a master of unarmed combat before the US government consider using him for black ops. Action thriller, starring Dylan O'Brien, Michael Keaton and Sanaa Lathan

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc:
A Show About Pedantry: Contenders Frankie Boyle, Ivo Graham, Jenny Eclair, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Mae Martin continue to address the challenges set for them by Greg Davies. It's nearly the end of the series, and the pressure is so intense that Mae immediately forgets the only rule to a task. Greg demands to be educated about history - but the five comics only seem to know about the year 1066. And there's paint, stomping, poor time-keeping and some impressively sneaky prizes in this quazi semi-final. As usual, Alex Horne helps maintain order
S15E09

programme.title: Open House: The Great Sex Experiment
programme.desc:
Childhood sweethearts Natalie and Tom from Yorkshire arrive at the retreat wanting to spice up their 12-year relationship. Their mismatched sexual histories mean that Natalie arrives with a confidence that Tom might be unable to match. After a flirtatious evening leads to steamy intimacy in the hot tub with residents Josh and Holly, the couple are left questioning everything. Meanwhile, Chanice and Richardo invite 15 of the residents upstairs for an orgy, though being in a room with so many people having sex proves overwhelming for Richardo, so a once-in-a-lifetime experience seems set to pass the couple by
S02E02

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc:
Anna Richardson meets 34 year-old Skyla from Kent who runs her own cleaning business and is looking for Mr Right. Zeus, a 27-year-old trans man from Norwich, is new to the dating scene and is looking for someone special to go on this journey with him
S11E06

programme.title: The World's Most Luxurious Holidays
programme.desc:
A VIP invitation to explore some of the most amazing hotels, villas and island escapes on the planet. This episode explores New York's Mark Hotel and its £55,000-a-night penthouse suite, where Meghan Markle held her baby shower. Next up in the Algarve, Portugal, is the £180,000-a-week Vila Azzurine, where billionaires retreat to when they are looking for some sun and sea, before embarking on a £16,000-a-night ultra-lux safari adventure at the Royal Malewane in South Africa's Kruger National Park. Narrated by Cherie Lunghi
S01E01

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc:
The Beach House: The final visit is to the Beach House in Portland, Dorset, where Pete Lacey feels his back-to-basics approach offers his guests good value. But things get heated with the radiator in Karen and Liam's room and opinions are laid bare over dinner
S2020E39

programme.title: Vera Drake (2004)
programme.desc: A kindly woman living in 1950s London carries out discreet illegal abortions for women in desperate straits, an activity she keeps secret from her family. However, the business is exposed when a young woman falls seriously ill after the operation, leaving her facing prosecution. Mike Leigh's drama, starring Imelda Staunton, Phil Davis, Eddie Marsan and Sally Hawkins

programme.title: The Time Being (2012)
programme.desc: A struggling artist pursues his dreams at the expense of his family's lives. A wealthy eccentric seemingly provides a lifeline by offering him a commission for his work, but as his encounters with his new benefactor grow more unusual, he is forced to reconcile his personal ambitions with his responsibilities. Drama, starring Frank Langella and Wes Bentley

programme.title: Minutes Past Midnight (2016)
programme.desc: Horror anthology featuring stories from the Little Terrors film festival, crammed with demons, cannibals, killers, ghosts, monsters and other horrors. Starring Jason Flemyng

programme.title: Splice (2009)
programme.desc: Two scientists hope to create new creatures for medical purposes by combining DNA from various animals. When their funding is stopped, they secretly create a new creature incorporating human DNA. However, they soon realise they cannot control it, while the relationship between the being and its creators turns dangerous. Sci-fi horror, starring Adrien Brody, Sarah Polley and Delphine Chaneac
A man's life is derailed when a disturbing pattern of events repeats itself in the same manner every day, ending at 2.22 pm. Thriller, starring Michiel Huisman, Teresa Palmer and Maeve Dermody

programme.title: Nightcrawler (2014)
programme.desc: A cynical petty crook is inspired when he sees a freelance camera crew, and decides to go into business filming crime scenes and accidents, then selling the footage to news broadcasters. His determination to stay ahead of the competition leads him down a dark path as his methods become increasingly ruthless. Crime drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rene Russo and Bill Paxton

programme.desc: A six-year-old girl's father falls ill, and the sickness seems to have a destructive effect on the world around them. Fantasy, starring Quvenzhane Wallis and Dwight Henry

programme.desc: A rock star recovering from surgery retreats to the peaceful surroundings of a Mediterranean island with her lover. Their seclusion is disrupted by the arrival of an old flame and his estranged teenage daughter, and a complex, tempestuous relationship develops between the four of them, bringing old memories to the surface. Drama, starring Tilda Swinton and Ralph Fiennes

programme.title: Lucky Numbers (2000)
programme.desc: A weatherman faces financial ruin when his investment in a snowmobile business is ruined by good weather. Heavily in debt and under threat from criminals, he connives with the presenter of the state lottery to resolve his money worries by rigging the draw. Comedy, starring John Travolta, Lisa Kudrow and Tim Roth

programme.desc: A convict is transferred to a maximum security prison, where he falls foul of a sadistic warden with a grudge against him - and who abuses his position of power to make the inmate's life a misery and destroy his good relationship with the guards. Thriller, starring Sylvester Stallone, Donald Sutherland, Darlanne Fluegel and Tom Sizemore

programme.desc: An area of Mexico is sealed off when a space probe crash leaves it inhabited by vast alien creatures. Sci-fi drama, with Whitney Able and Scoot McNairy

programme.desc: Kate and John Coleman, a couple who have seemingly put past troubles in their marriage behind them, decide to adopt a nine-year-old Russian girl from an orphanage. Horror, starring Vera Farmiga and Peter Sarsgaard

programme.title: In the Valley of Elah (2007)
programme.desc: A retired military investigator's soldier son disappears without trace shortly after returning from Iraq. Frustrated at the police and the army's lack of progress in solving the case, he begins to suspect a cover-up and enlists the aid of a small-town detective in uncovering the truth. Drama, starring Tommy Lee Jones, Charlize Theron and Susan Sarandon
